how_it_works.title: How It Works
how_it_works.description: Simple steps to get delicious, healthy meals delivered to your door

step1.title: CHOOSE YOUR MEALS
step1.description: Rotating menu of 16 balanced dishes per week, over 50 meals per month.

step2.title: WE GET COOKING
step2.description: Whilst you do you. Sit back, relax + let our chefs get the pots simmering.

step3.title: HEAT, EAT & ENJOY
step3.description: No prep. No mess. Our meals arrive ready to heat and eat in minutes.

fresh_meals.main_description: We only use premium ingredients from our network of trusted partners. All meals are Chef-prepared and Dietitian-approved.
fresh_meals.fresh_description: We only use premium ingredients from our network of trusted partners. All meals are Chef-prepared and Dietitian-approved.
fresh_meals.chef_description: Our team of culinary experts craft meals so mouthwatering, you won't believe they're healthy.
fresh_meals.dietitian_description: Our registered dietitians work hand-in-hand with our kitchen to ensure every meal is packed with premium, science-backed nutritional quality.

menu.title: DELICIOUS MEALS CRAFTED FOR YOU
menu.description: Explore our rotating menu of chef-crafted, nutritionist-approved meals. Each dish is carefully designed to deliver exceptional taste and optimal nutrition.
menu.cta_text: Ready to start your healthy journey with delicious meals?
menu.description_page: Discover our carefully crafted meals, made with fresh ingredients and designed to fuel your healthy lifestyle.
menu.select_date: Select a date to view available meals

reviews.title: LOVED BY MOROCCO
reviews.description: Discover what our customers across Morocco are saying about their healthy meal experience with PrepMe.
reviews.review1: PrepMe has transformed my busy lifestyle! The meals are incredibly fresh and the Moroccan-inspired flavors remind me of home. Perfect for my hectic schedule in Rabat.
reviews.review2: As a busy professional in Rabat, I was struggling to eat healthy. PrepMe's nutritious meals have been a game-changer. The quality and taste exceed my expectations!
reviews.review3: The variety is amazing! Each week brings new flavors that satisfy my palate. The traditional Moroccan touches in some dishes make me feel connected to our beautiful culture.
reviews.review4: Living in Fès, I appreciate authentic flavors. PrepMe delivers fresh, healthy meals that respect our culinary heritage while meeting modern nutritional needs.
reviews.review5: From Agadir with love! PrepMe has made healthy eating so convenient. The meals arrive fresh and the packaging is eco-friendly. Highly recommend!
reviews.review6: Tanger resident here! The chef-crafted meals are restaurant-quality. I've never eaten so well while maintaining my fitness goals. Simply exceptional!

client_reviews.title: CLIENT TESTIMONIALS
client_reviews.description: See what our satisfied customers are saying about their meal prep experience.
client_reviews.review1: The meals are absolutely delicious and so convenient! I love that I can focus on my work while still eating healthy, nutritious food every day.
client_reviews.review2: PrepMe has completely changed my lifestyle. The portion sizes are perfect and the flavors are amazing. Highly recommend to anyone busy like me!
client_reviews.review3: I've tried many meal services, but PrepMe stands out with their quality and taste. The customer service is also excellent. Five stars!
client_reviews.review4: Perfect for my fitness goals! The nutritional balance is spot on and the meals keep me energized throughout the day. Will definitely continue!
client_reviews.review5: The variety keeps me excited about meal time. Never boring, always fresh and delicious. PrepMe is worth every penny!
client_reviews.review6: As someone with dietary restrictions, I appreciate how accommodating PrepMe is. The meals are fresh, tasty, and meet all my nutritional needs.

about.title: FROM OUR KITCHEN TO YOURS
about.story_opening: Our story started with a simple dream in Morocco. A small kitchen in Rabat and a hunger for something more. Two passionate entrepreneurs with a very supportive family behind them.
about.story_problem: We noticed how difficult it was for busy professionals to maintain a healthy lifestyle. Long work hours, limited time for meal prep, and the lack of nutritious, convenient options in our beautiful Morocco.
about.story_solution: So we took our grandmother's traditional recipes, combined them with modern nutritional science, and created PrepMe. We started small, cooking fresh meals in our home kitchen and delivering them to friends and colleagues.
about.story_growth: Word spread quickly. Soon we were serving hundreds, then thousands across Morocco. The demand was incredible - people were hungry for healthy, delicious meals that honored our culinary heritage.
about.story_mission: Now, PrepMe has become more than a meal delivery service. We're a movement towards healthier living, supporting local farmers, and celebrating Moroccan flavors in every bite.
about.story_future: This was never just the plan, but it's become our life - to help you live your healthiest, happiest life while staying connected to the flavors that make Morocco special.
about.value1_desc: Premium ingredients, expert preparation, nutritionist-approved recipes
about.value2_desc: Nourishing your body while delighting your taste buds every day
about.value3_desc: Celebrating our rich culinary heritage with modern nutritional wisdom
about.closing_message: We're here to make healthy eating effortless, delicious, and authentically Moroccan.

for_teams.hero_title: CORPORATE MEAL DELIVERY FOR YOUR TEAM
for_teams.hero_description: Elevate your employees' well-being with fresh, nutritious meals delivered directly to your workplace. Show you care about their health and productivity.
for_teams.why_title: WHY CHOOSE PREPME FOR YOUR TEAM?
for_teams.why_description: Invest in your team's health and productivity with our comprehensive corporate meal solution.
for_teams.benefit1_desc: Promote healthy eating habits and show your team you care about their health and happiness.
for_teams.benefit2_desc: No more lunch breaks spent searching for food. Meals arrive ready to eat.
for_teams.benefit3_desc: Create opportunities for team bonding during lunch breaks with shared healthy meals.
for_teams.comparison_description: See why PrepMe is the better choice for corporate meal delivery.
for_teams.how_description: Getting started with corporate meal delivery is simple.
for_teams.step1_desc: Reach out to discuss your team's needs and preferences.
for_teams.step2_desc: We'll create a tailored meal plan that fits your budget and team size.
for_teams.step3_desc: Fresh meals delivered weekly to your office. No hassle, just great food.
for_teams.cta_description: Contact us today to learn more about our corporate meal delivery solutions.

for_collab.hero_description: Join our partnership program and help your clients achieve their health goals while earning rewards. Together, we can make healthy eating accessible to everyone.
for_collab.benefits_title: AWESOME PERKS OF PARTNERING WITH PREPME
for_collab.benefits_description: Discover the benefits of joining our partnership network.
for_collab.benefit1_desc: Help your clients reach their health goals with our nutritious, chef-prepared meals that deliver real results.
for_collab.benefit2_desc: Build your reputation as a trusted health professional by offering comprehensive nutrition solutions.
for_collab.benefit3_desc: Earn commissions when your clients subscribe using your referral code. Turn your network into income.
for_collab.how_description: Joining our partnership program is simple and rewarding.
for_collab.step1_desc: Fill out our simple application form. It takes less than 2 minutes!
for_collab.step2_desc: We'll review your application and get back to you within 48 hours.
for_collab.step3_desc: Use your unique referral link and promotional materials to share PrepMe with your network.
for_collab.step4_desc: Earn commissions on every successful referral. Watch your network grow!
for_collab.testimonials_description: Hear from successful partners in our network.
for_collab.testimonial1: PrepMe has been a game-changer for my clients. The meals are delicious and the results speak for themselves!
for_collab.testimonial2: The partnership program is fantastic. I've earned great commissions while helping my clients eat healthier.
for_collab.testimonial3: PrepMe makes it easy to provide complete nutrition solutions to my clients. Highly recommended!
for_collab.testimonial4: The support team is amazing and the commissions are paid on time. Great partnership opportunity!
for_collab.apply_title: READY TO BECOME A PREPME PARTNER?
for_collab.apply_description: Join our growing network of health professionals and start earning while helping others achieve their wellness goals.
for_collab.application_note: Applications are reviewed within 48 hours. We'll get back to you with next steps.
